description:
Keep your bearing on calm seas or when you’re socked in with waves breaking over your deck. Silva has designed a nearly universal deck mount, simply attached the 58 compass’s hooks to your boat’s deck lines and you’re ready to navigate. By mounting your compass towards the bow, you can keep your eyes on the horizon and your bearing at the same time.

  • Bungee mounting straps for stability in rough seas (Heeling angle - roll: 20° pitch: 20°)
  • Rubber feet prevent slippage
  • Completely waterproof design
  • Scratch resistant glass
name: Silva 58 Kayak Compass
